introduction: Easy-Peasy.AI is an AI-powered platform that offers a variety of tools for creating AI bots, converting text to speech, transcribing audio files, generating images and art, and more. Users can choose from different subscription plans based on their needs.
features: Convert text into natural sounding speech
Transcribe audio files with AI automation
Create images and art with AI
Generate articles, social media posts, emails, and more

faqs.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.

faqs.question: Is there a discount for annual subscriptions?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a 40% discount for choosing the annual plan.

faqs.question: When will I be billed?
faqs.answer: You will be billed at the start of your subscription.

faqs.question: Is there a money-back guarantee?
faqs.answer: Yes, a full refund is guaranteed within 30 days of purchase if Easy-Peasy.AI doesn't meet your needs.

faqs.question: Are there any hidden fees?
faqs.answer: No, there are no hidden fees. You only pay the monthly subscription fee.

faqs.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
faqs.answer: You can easily cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings.

faqs.question: Do you offer support?
faqs.answer: Yes, email and live chat support are available for all customers.

faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: All major credit cards and debit cards are accepted. Payments are secured by Stripe for privacy and security. For PayPal payments, please contact Easy-Peasy.AI.
